website_summaries.verdict: A classic, affordable can opener by a top brand in kitchenware that comes with some useful features and a few flaws.
pros: Streamlined design doesn't take up a lot of storage space
Attaches easily to cans, and knob turns smoothly as you work
cons: Often leaves cans and lids jagged

customer_reviews.title: RUSTING AFTER 2 WEEKS
customer_reviews.text: Cutter wheel is rusting after occasional usage, and rinsing off after each use. I asked for a refund, and was approved for a full refund without needing to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a fluke but mine broke
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach to a jar or can and easy to wind. With use it did deteriorate though. Four months later I have to buy a new one. Maybe I got a lemon Since this product does have good ratings and I don’t abuse my things nor did I use it extensively .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It broke
customer_reviews.text: This item broke within the first 2 months 😩. I had to go buy a new one at the store
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Scholten

customer_reviews.title: Can Falls Out
customer_reviews.text: I have repeatedly dropped cans while opening them using this product.
customer_reviews.author: JimZ

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Dependable and sturdy. Got for a “to go “ bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to finally having a good can opener. From the first try, it does not open the can evenly. Don’t be fooled by the “professional” name.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. Not too heavy and not too light.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry N.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. Don’t know if I got a defective one. Only bought to avoid going out to store since I have asthma. I’ve bought better can opener at the dollar tree for 99 cents. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but i guess i can find this for lower price. Seems little pricey for the product. It’s not dishwasher safe that’s one negative point.
customer_reviews.author: Jeet Upadhyay

customer_reviews.title: Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: Makes quick work when opening cans. Cutting wheel smoothly cut through the top.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Geyer

customer_reviews.title: Get a Armp opener (P38 - look it up)
customer_reviews.text: Have had this opener for 18 months, opened 5 cans a year... dropped in garbage tonight out of sheer frstration. Save the head aches.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: product was broken in package
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to be botherd with returning it I just will go elsewhere in the future to purchase. Makes no sense to have to return an $8 order
customer_reviews.author: paige cullen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor durability
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first few uses but then diminished to completely useless in less than 50 cans, extremely poor durability.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: What I expected.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it's a can opener. It works.
customer_reviews.author: britteny

customer_reviews.title: Great can opener
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome can opener. Have been through countless models and this does the trick. Have premature arthritis in my hands and it’s easy tomuse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the top-quality of all can openers. It feels lightweight. This can-opener will get the job done, but may slip and you will have to reposition the opener. (Although, we all slip with can openers every now and then regardless of quality.) If you are looking for a simple opener, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take up much room
customer_reviews.text: It's small but does a great job of opening my cans.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My 15+ years old one broke and I bought this one hoping to last that long. It’s been couple of months. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: YY

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 5 months then fell apart. Tried to put back together, but it seems like the screw threads that hold it all together are stripped out because it just falls apart again as soon as you try to use it again :(
customer_reviews.author: Sara Behm

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Fast
customer_reviews.text: I really like this can opener, except that it has to be hand-washed. I'm not sure where "Heat Resistant" came from in the product name. There's nothing in the packaging declaring heat resistance and it says to wash by hand (not in dishwasher). Other than that, it's a great can opener! It clamps on easily to the can, turns smoothly, opens the can quickly, and has comfortable grips and knob. Highly recommended, if you're willing to wash it by hand. {To be fair, a quick rinse of the cutter will usually suffice.} Review of:  :-)
customer_reviews.author: Alan Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This is basically your standard can-opener that works well. It doesn't have a great *feel* to it - it feels very light, especially the plastic which feels a little loose - but it does a good job. After using it for several weeks nothing has broken or come apart. It's very sharp and cuts cans easily - no stopping and restarting, like seems to happen all the time. It seems to be a nice can-opener even thought the feeling of it isn't quite as solid as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This is a good can opener. It feels fine in the hand, the blade is sharp, and the knob turns easily. I'm not sure what makes it "professional," however. It's the same as other name brand can openers I have had. There is also a built in bottle opener, which saves the need of having an extra tool. Not dishwasher safe, which at some point I'm bound to forget.
customer_reviews.author: JJL

customer_reviews.title: Good Grip, Strong Build Quality, and Heat-Resistant
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grip, effective cut, and strong build quality, this professional heat-resistant can opener has a comfortable, non-slip grip and works smoothly. You don't want to put in dishwasher. Hand wash with hot soapy water and dry immediately. If your'e looking for mechanical heat-resistant can opener that is easy to grip, I can give these the highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: M. JEFFREY MCMAHON

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty standard can opener; it doesn't have a lot of heft to it. While it works ok for now, it feels like one of the cheaper versions and I would not expect it to last a really long time. There are some larger cans it struggles to be able to cut through. For the price it's ok but it doesn't hold a candle to my Kitchenaid can opener.
customer_reviews.author: Epilady

customer_reviews.title: Another great Farberware product!
customer_reviews.text: When an electric can opener is not an option or you prefer a manual opener, this one does not disappoint giving a clean crisp cut every time without exerting great effort when turning the handle. Give it is try and see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Solid, not heavy duty, construction. Should last for a while. I find that wear and tear to the blade means these last a couple years at most anyways. Much better than discount store cheapies.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Works well, not the quality we expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace our can opener of the same brand that we've had for six years. It works well. However, the one thing we did notice is that the handles and construction is not as good as the one we had of the same brand. We replaced the old one because it rusted, but still worked. I can't say I'm confident this one will last as long as that one did.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 4 months. Handle came off and it won’t open cans anymore. Save your money, it’s garbage!
customer_reviews.author: AU!

customer_reviews.title: Even better than the Sabatier I loved
customer_reviews.text: This isn't as sexy as thewe used to use but it is a much better can opener. By odd coincidence, I was offered this Farberware for review purposes just as my wife had been telling me that she found the heavy-duty Sabatier impossible to use. I liked the Sabatier because it is so heavy, but my wife told me that it might be fine for a 6-foot tall guy who weighs 230 pounds but for the average-sized woman it was much too hard to use. Shortly after this Farberware appeared on our kitchen counter, the Sabatier disappeared (I am pretty sure she disposed of it). I have to admit, this Farberware is much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Works well, handle is strongly attached but not dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: The Good: -- Reasonably comfortable to grip both on handles and turning knob. -- The knob is strongly attached to the shaft. Annoying on other openers Ive had is the fact the plastic knob would break loose and spin on the shaft. I did a test on the Farberware model, held the shaft end with pliers and turned hard on the knob and it did not break loose. -- It opened a can with the same effort as any other opener and made a clean cut. -- It has a built in bottle cap opener at the tip. The Bad: -- It is hand wash only. Not dishwasher safe. For this I remove 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: rkruz

customer_reviews.title: A solid can opener for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can openers are one of the items that wear out quickly and companies seem to make them disposable on purpose. This one is at least built a bit more sturdy than most, but I get the feeling it isn't going to last more than a couple years in a house with three teenagers. But for the time being, it is very sharp and cuts through the cans easily. The crank works well and opens with minimal fuss. I have no idea why you would need a can opener to be heat resistant, but this one is. Overall, this is a solid can opener for a really good price (9.99).
customer_reviews.author: Drew Ross

customer_reviews.title: Canny do much better
customer_reviews.text: Great can opener. Large key and handles, gives you plenty of leverage. Made from high carbon steel with simple care by washing in warm soapy water. Heat resistance means it can be kept near stoves and cook tops with fear the handles will melt. End has a little hook that can be used to open bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Basic can opener, works acceptably well
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what makes this opener "Professional" or why the heck anyone would need a heat resistant can opener (which isn't dishwasher safe), but as a generic can opener, this one does the trick without any unnecessary bells and whistles. The bottle opener also works well.
customer_reviews.author: 2WheelTravlr

customer_reviews.title: Large grips
customer_reviews.text: Great opener, easy to use! large handle for easy gripping and turning. The teeth don’t skip unlike the cheaper ones I’ve used. Bottle opener works
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Mc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Basic Kitchen Tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, basic can opener plus church-key style bottle opener. I would have rated it 5 stars if I could toss it in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Word Lover

customer_reviews.title: Can opener and Bottle opener combined
customer_reviews.text: This can opener also serves as a bottle opener. Sturdy and very easy to use with a comfortable handle.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I prefer manual can openers. I like Faberware quality. This will work well, even if there is a power failure!
customer_reviews.author: reg

customer_reviews.title: Not s good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and the first one I used about five or six times and then it stopped working so threw it away so then I started using my second one that I had had at my office and I brought it home and it was working for a few times and then it's wasn't able to open any cans. I don't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Corine Carpenter

product_meta.title: Farberware Professional Can Bottle Opener, One Size, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Farberware Can Opener is an essential tool for any kitchen. The can opener's large, easy-to-turn knob makes opening cans an easy task. The can opener features a durable, polished chrome head. An additional bottle opener is built in, allowing you to open all kinds of bottled beverages. The can opener measures 9 inches in length. This product is not dishwasher safe. Hand wash with warm water and a mild detergent; rinse and dry immediately. Lifetime limited .
feature_bullets: ESSENTIAL FOR ANY KITCHEN: The Farberware Professional Heat Resistant Can Opener is an ideal addition to any kitchen. No kitchen is complete without one.
COMPACT IN DESIGN: This can opener's design allows for compact drawer storage.
EASY TO TURN KNOB: Never have the worry of struggling to open another can, this can opener features an easy-to-turn knob making opening cans an easy task.

DURABLE AND STRONG CONSTRUCTION: This can opener features strong and durable blades for a smooth glide. This product is also heat resistant so never worry about it getting too close to any hot surfaces while cooking.
LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY INCLUDED WITH PURCHASE: Never worry about the hassle of replacing a product, the Lifetime Limited Warranty is included with purchase.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars115 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
